Name: Anthro Characters
Author: Gaveliere (Twitter: @Gavelly) Blanchard a.k.a sion9000 (Twitter: @NekoBlanchard) Krystedez (Twitter: @ChiefKryz) donedonedone (FurAffinity: donedonedone)
Description: Overwrites every NPC sprite, portrait and event sprites, effectively transforming everyone into anthropormorphic animal characters. Art by Gav!
